title: Random mutations
body: Implement a mode to enable adding a set number of random mutations in the generated oligo dataset.

title: Add a check to exclude oligos with >4 T's in the sequence to avoid U6 termination.
Avoid passing database object as the function arguments.
Add argument parsing for standalone execution.
Add file path arguments for file handing.
Implement Filters
body: Filter class with name variable and counter

title: Implement new, more specific energy estimation module.
Implement a search method for sequence within sequence
body: Allow for choosing a subsequence within a user submitted input sequence. Possibly use '[' ']' markup for sequence inclusion and '<' '>' for sequence exclusion.

title: Rewrite `logging` handling
body: Configure `logging` properly and put it in a separate file.

title: Implement better sequence finding within the target transcript.
body: Use genomic location to find the oligonucleotide sequence within the processed transcript.

title: Make BLAST query for all the sequences in a batch
Use RNAplfold
body:
Use RNAplfold as per Lu, Z. J., & Mathews, D. H. (2008). Efficient siRNA selection using hybridization thermodynamics. Nucleic Acids Research, 36(2), 640â€“647. https://doi.org/10.1093/nar/gkm920; with window size of 800 nucleotides;

Check if further method parametrization would help the predictions.

title: Deconvolve the guide secondary structure
body: Asses self complementarity and complementarity with non-variable CRISPR DR sequence.

title: Fit linear regression model to predict the crRNA efficiency
body: With predictors such as target accessibility, monomer free anergy, %GC content, putative PFS sequences etc. among others.
